Package state

Class RequestState

java.lang.Object
state.RequestState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
public class RequestState
extends java.lang.Object
implements State

Request State Class

The Request State object that defines the state where user is after successfully loaded a planning request

See Also:
State, ListOfCommands

    void calculateTour​(ListOfCommands l, MVCController c, PlanningRequest p, Map m)

      When user picks a map file in the View, the LoadMapCommand is added and executed, state becomes Map State
      Specified by:
      loadMap in interface State
      Parameters:
      l - the history of commands in which will be added the new command to execute
      c - the MVCController object being passed to the command execution for updating purposes
      p - the path of the map file

    • calculateTour

      public void calculateTour​(ListOfCommands l, MVCController c, PlanningRequest p, Map m)
      When user clicks on "Calculate Tour", the ComputeTourCommand is added and executed, state becomes Tour State
      Specified by:
      calculateTour in interface State
      Parameters:
      l - the history of commands in which will be added the new command to execute
      c - the MVCController object being passed to the command execution for updating purposes
      p - The requests' planning to be satisfied
      m - The map chosen by the user on which all the pickups and deliveries are made
